typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Location as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string,
		Empire_State_Burger as string,
		Chicken_Tikka as string,
		Gammon_afternoon_deal as string,
		Chocolate_Brownie as string,
		Doom_Bar as string,
		Birra_Moretti as string,
		Porn_Star_at_2_x_12 as string,
		Porn_Star_glass as string,
		MEAL as string,
		Notes as string,
		Moretti_as_a_pc_of_a_tikka as string,
		Moretti_as_pc_of_burger as string,
		PRICE_BUCKETS as string,
		Food_cost as string,
		Drink_cost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> getSpoons
getSpoons sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> putSpoons
